I went to a show of courtroom art in San Diego when I saw the work of Bill Robles.
And I was so floored by his artwork, I just said, well, if that's what courtroom art can be well, then I would love to do that.

It looked so easy.

What was the transition like?

Why don't you explain to us - for those who don't exactly understand - how are the pictures used?
